name: Polyempest
description:
In this game shooting drains health and getting hit regains health flipping the idea of failure in a shoot-em up on its head. You must defend your tower from the evil shapes from outer space. you know like those clowns? There is a highscore system so try to beat it and highscores save so you can come back later. (just don't delete your cookies!) 

Controls are: WASD to move click to shoot R to restart.

Enemy's have different AIs: Cowardly (Green square) stays behind, Tankie (Pink hexagon) Will move slowly towards the Tower while shooting, Hydra (Red rhombus) will split into three after being killed. Don't kill to many hydras too quickly or you will be flooded with enemy's!

Please report any incidents of the game being to sluggish as this is a known bug and I need to know who has this to narrow it down. Also I recommend you download rather then run in WebGL as for some reason it only works in Dev Mode on itch.io. Apologies for all these bugs as I was late for the Jam and I don't have much time left to fix them. Doesn't mean its not fun! Sometimes I can't put it down while testing.
